title: Ingrid Components Announce Made in Italy 1x Drivetrain
content:
Ingrid Components, makers of made in Italy components, just announced their complete 1x drivetrain system. It’s one of the most stunning kits we’ve seen and it comes at a premium pricepoint, but based on our hands-on experience with the brand’s components, it’s gonna be good. Check out the breakdown below and ordering information at Biciclista USA.

INGRID CRS-R2 Crankset $579.00 Available in S,M,L lengths, 131mm or 136mm bb spindle length, in black, raw or titanium colored.

INGRID REAR DERAILLEUR RD1 $699 Available in SRAM, Campy, Shimano, MTB or road actuation, short to long cages.

INGRID 48T10 12 Speed Cassette $469 Available in 44, 46, 48, 11 or 12 speeds

Due to the pandemic, many of these items are delayed, yet you can backorder it all at Biciclista USA.
